title: FS: T332 Helmar Stamp Glassine Envelope
author: Tom S.

posts.post_title: FS: T332 Helmar Stamp Glassine Envelope
posts.post_content:
I have a Helmar Stamp glassine envelope for sale - it would be a nice companion piece for a T332 collector.  I'm asking $20.00 shipped for the item.  PayPal (gift) or personal check please.  Thanks for looking!

[IMG]http://i168.photobucket.com/albums/u169/toppsopcfan/img017.jpg[/IMG]  [IMG]http://i168.photobucket.com/albums/u169/toppsopcfan/img018.jpg[/IMG]
Last bump before I take this item with me to the National and use it as trade bait...
